content: **set of knitted poncho with hood and booties for baby and children in drops snow** ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ see the little peach socks pattern here 1 ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ * **poncho ** **size** 1/3 - 6/9 - 12/18 months 2 3/4 years size in cm 50/56 - 62/68 - 74/80 86/92 - 98/104 materials drops snow from garnstudio 250-250-300 300-350 g colour no 30 pink or use drops wish from garnstudio 200-200-250 250-250 g colour no 02 white fog drops circular needle size 8 mm / us 11 60 cm / 24 or size needed to get 11 sts x 15 row in stockinette st = 10 x 10 cm / 4 x 4 drops crochet hook size 10 mm / n/15 for tie strings french version 2 1 https //www ravelry com/patterns/library/b16-7-little-peach-socks 2 http //www garnstudio com/lang/fr/visoppskrift php d_nr=b16&d_id=1
